title: I will give a talk at the 15th Belgian NLP meetup in Ghent.
Our survey of intrinsic fairness measures got accepted at NAACL 2022.
Our paper on the role of stakeholders in public employment services got accepted at FAccT22.
I was at a Lorentz Center workshop on algorithmic fairness.
I presented our work on RobBERT at BNAIC/Benelearn 2021.
I gave a talk at FEAST @ ECML-PKDD 2021 about of our workshop on algorithmic tools in public employment services.
We released our paper on attitudes towards corona measures.
I gave a presentation on versioning at Open Science Discovery for PhD Students.
We released the Android version of 'What the mask'.
I gave a presentation about RobBERT at TechWolf.
I gave a presentation about RobBERT at ML6.
Our COVID-19 mask policy application was featured in HBVL.
